name: Sky-High Fibre Creamy Toast - Plain
description: Enjoy a healthier start to your day with our Sky-High Fibre Creamy Toast - Plain, a masterpiece crafted for those who appreciate low-sugar, healthified recipes. This dish combines the wholesome goodness of whole wheat bread, oats, and protein from egg, creating a balanced and nutritious breakfast that keeps you fueled.
recipeIngredient: 0.50  cup ( 8 oz--250 ml ), Ice Cold Water

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk the large egg in a bowl until smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Add milk powder and ice cold water to the egg and continue to whisk until the mixture is well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Stir in the quick cook oats and sugar substitute into the mixture, ensuring everything is evenly distributed.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat a non-stick skillet or pan over medium heat.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Soak each slice of whole wheat bread in the mixture, ensuring both sides are well coated.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Cook the soaked bread slices on the preheated skillet for about 2 minutes on each side or until golden brown.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the creamy toast hot, ideally with a side of fresh fruits or a dollop of your favorite low-sugar jam for an extra burst of flavor.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7
